update.description:
Continuing on pull request #184, this is preparation for a publisher refactor that will come in a third pull request.

Here, we're accommodating the `AdvertiseOptions` inside the `Publisher` classes.

CI results:

* [Trusty](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64/178/) :large_blue_circle: 
* [Homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/185/) :large_blue_circle: 
* [Windows](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/343/) :large_blue_circle:
update.title: Publisher refactor (2/3)

content.raw:
@nkoenig and I talked offline about this. The problem shows when you have a different version already installed, and then, you compile this branch and run the tests (without install). It should be fixed with b560087.

Could you give it a try?
content.html:
@nkoenig and I talked offline about this. The problem shows when you have a different version already installed, and then, you compile this branch and run the tests (without install). It should be fixed with b560087.

Could you give it a try?

content.raw:
I see the following error with `UNIT_ign_TEST`


```
#!c++

/data/ignition/ign-transport/tools/ign_TEST.cc:86: Failure
Value of: "/foo\n"
Expected: output
Which is: ""
[  FAILED  ] ignTest.TopicList (3106 ms)
[ RUN      ] ignTest.TopicInfo
/data/ignition/ign-transport/tools/ign_TEST.cc:108: Failure
Expected: (output.size()) > (50u), actual: 30 vs 50
[  FAILED  ] ignTest.TopicInfo (1362 ms)
[ RUN      ] ignTest.ServiceList
/data/ignition/ign-transport/tools/ign_TEST.cc:132: Failure
Value of: "/foo\n"
Expected: output
Which is: ""
[  FAILED  ] ignTest.ServiceList (6107 ms)
[ RUN      ] ignTest.ServiceInfo
/data/ignition/ign-transport/tools/ign_TEST.cc:154: Failure
Expected: (output.size()) > (50u), actual: 39 vs 50
[  FAILED  ] ignTest.ServiceInfo (1361 ms)
[ RUN      ] ignTest.TopicListSameProc
/data/ignition/ign-transport/tools/ign_TEST.cc:178: Failure
Value of: "/foo\n"
Expected: output
Which is: ""
[  FAILED  ] ignTest.TopicListSameProc (1357 ms)
[ RUN      ] ignTest.TopicInfoSameProc
/data/ignition/ign-transport/tools/ign_TEST.cc:200: Failure
Expected: (output.size()) > (50u), actual: 30 vs 50
[  FAILED  ] ignTest.TopicInfoSameProc (1356 ms)
[ RUN      ] ignTest.ServiceListSameProc
/data/ignition/ign-transport/tools/ign_TEST.cc:215: Failure
Value of: "/foo\n"
Expected: output
Which is: ""
[  FAILED  ] ignTest.ServiceListSameProc (1373 ms)
[ RUN      ] ignTest.ServiceInfoSameProc
/data/ignition/ign-transport/tools/ign_TEST.cc:230: Failure
Expected: (output.size()) > (50u), actual: 39 vs 50
[  FAILED  ] ignTest.ServiceInfoSameProc (1354 ms)
[ RUN      ] ignTest.TopicPublish
/data/ignition/ign-transport/tools/ign_TEST.cc:252: Failure
Value of: "good_value"
Expected: g_topicCBStr
Which is: "bad_value"
[  FAILED  ] ignTest.TopicPublish (1867 ms)
[ RUN      ] ignTest.ServiceRequest
/data/ignition/ign-transport/tools/ign_TEST.cc:290: Failure
Value of: "data: " + value + "\n\n"
  Actual: "data: 10\n\n"
Expected: output
Which is: "Exception sending a message\nService call timed out\n"
```
